Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Small vase for cosmetics with a narrow neck, extremely bulging body and a flat circular base. The shape of the orifice resembles that of the mortar used with this vessel.  Traces of dark grey cosmetic paints remain inside.
